How many people are affected by campomelic dysplasia ?,"The prevalence of campomelic dysplasia is uncertain; estimates range from 1 in 40,000 to 200,000 people.",GHR,campomelic dysplasia
What are the genetic changes related to campomelic dysplasia ?,"Mutations in or near the SOX9 gene cause campomelic dysplasia. This gene provides instructions
